definition: unhealthy looking, any of several Old World shrubby broad-leaved willows having large catkins, cause to become a sickly pale color
details:
adjective
- unhealthy looking
= synonyms: sickly
- a tan colour, associated with people from southern Europe or East Asia
= example: a tan colour, associated with people from southern Europe or East Asia
noun
- any of several Old World shrubby broad-leaved willows having large catkins
verb
- cause to become a sickly pale color
= example: cause to become a sickly pale color
